title: Efficiently Updating and Tracking the Dominant Kernel Eigenspace
venue: (a) Katholieke Universiteit Leuven Department of Electrical Engineering, ESAT-SCD-SISTA
window: true eigenvectors are approximated whilst tracking (ie up/downdating and downsizing) a kernel matrix. We consider a representative example of a kernel matrix, based upon the known Abalone benchmark dataset [14] with n = 3000 training instances having dimension p = 7.
